synopsis.text: Butterfly Lan's novel, 'Melee Mage in Online Games,' serves as the inspiration for the anime 'Melee Mage.' The story revolves around Gu Fei, a skilled martial artist and physical education teacher who ventures into the world of online gaming at the suggestion of his students. A twist of fate leads him to select the mage class by mistake, resulting in his transformation into a formidable melee mage. As he navigates this new virtual landscape, Gu Fei combines his innate strength with magical abilities, forging an unconventional and thrilling gaming path. Witness how this powerful warrior redefines the role of a mage in this captivating tale.
